column4: selinexium, you'd probably want to install some mta to just do local mail, have fetchmail fetch the mail from your mail account and inject it into the local mail spool, and then procmail and spamassassin to assassinate that spam!
but where do i put --force in sudo apt-get remove openoffice.org-core?
E: Option -force: Configuration item specification must have an =<val>.
